title: New deposit, find change in liabilities, reserves

content.question: Assume that the reserve requirement is 15 percent and that a bank receives a new checking deposit of $200. Which of the following will most likely occur in the bank's balance sheet?

choices.label:
Liabilities: Increase by $200
Required Reserves: Increase by $170

Liabilities: Increase by $200
Required Reserves: Increase by $30

Liabilities: Increase by $200
Required Reserves: Not change

Liabilities: Decrease by $200
Required Reserves: Decrease by $30

Liabilities: Decrease by $200
Required Reserves: Decrease by $170

content.answer:
Liabilities: Increase by $200
Required Reserves: Increase by $30

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
